H0.text: Sneezing is one way the body reacts to cold weather.

H1.text: Swallowing is one way the body reacts to cold weather.

H2.text: Shivering is one way the body reacts to cold weather.

H3.text: Sweating is one way the body reacts to cold weather.

A4.text: When the core body temperature drops, the shivering reflex is triggered to maintain homeostasis.

A5.text: Skeletal muscles begin to shake in small movements, creating warmth by expending energy.
